name: MusicTrackLoopInfo
desc: Supports control of the looping behavior of a music track.

items.name: init(loopDuration: MusicTimeStamp, numberOfLoops: Int32)
items.desc: Initializes the music track loop information.

items.name: var loopDuration: MusicTimeStamp
items.desc: The point in a music track, measured in beats from the end of the music track, at which to begin playback during looped playback.

items.name: var numberOfLoops: Int32
items.desc: The number of times to play the designated portion of the music track.
